Whistler Search Add Update About & Help FAQ, Contact, Privacy Policy and Licence Attention Add new recipient Add new recipient list Add Server Blank Cancel Circle of Trust Manage your most trusted contacts who will be alerted when you activate panic mode Change secret mode password Change panic mode password Create new panic mode passcode Change panic mode password In order to ensure maximum security, please create your application lock pattern. This pattern will be used for unlocking the Whistler app on every run, so nobody except you can access your data. Pattern must contain at least 6 dots. Contact us Copyright © 2018 Build A Movement Collect Create new report For recipients who want to ask you additional questions before using or publishing your evidence--> For recipients who want to ask you additional questions before using or publishing your evidence. You must first specify you contact information here. Download in progress… Download completed. Starting download… Draft reports Delete draft? Delete sent report? Delete Draft Download Drafts Edit and send reports that you\'ve already started Date Description Include here any information that may help recipients better understand your report (who is in the video, what exactly happened, what was the context, ets). Decide who will receive your reports. Evidence Error This field can not be empty. Edit report Edit contact information Your archive is currently empty. Circle of trust Report recipients and lists Training materials When Panic Mode is activated, Whistler can erase the sensitive data you want to prevent from being accessed by a third party. Select here which data should be erased: Erasing sensitive data Press back button again to exit Field is not valid email address Error trying to get servers list. Please try again. Error creating server settings. Please try again. Error updating server settings. Please try again. Error removing server settings. Please try again. faq Gallery Incorrect password. Include geolocation in SMS Include contact information Lists Log out Open Create pattern Enter passphrase Location info Licence Manage recipients and lists Collecting current location metadata. You can skip it and continue with Report creation. Make Report Public Your report will be available for anyone to view on the Whistler website. If you keep it private, only your recipients will be able to view it. Your report cannot be public when you include contact information. Manage servers Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Add new contact in your Circle of Trust Name of recipient Name of recipient list Create new list Name New report Not included No recipient available No list available New recipient New list OK Open Sorry, this response is invalid! Sorry, this response is required! Panic mode activation In order to access Whistler application from secret mode Call permission is needed. In order to notify your friends that panic mode is activated, you need to allow Whistler permission to send SMS. In order to record audio files, you need to allow access to microphone. In order to share your location, you need to allow access to GPS. Panic message Draft the message that your circle of trust will receive when you activate panic mode Panic message is saved successfully. Phone number Password Old password New password Confirm password Password does not match the confirm password. Password is changed successfully. Panic and Secret passwords can\'t be the same. Your panic message will be sent by SMS to your Circle of Trust when you activate Panic Mode. Make sure it is clear and to the point. Consider using code language in case your SMS is intercepted. Including your geolocation will allow your Circle of Trust to find exactly where you triggered Panic Mode. However, it requires GPS to be enabled. Panic message sent successfully. Panic message sending failed, because of a generic failure. Panic message sending failed, because of a service error. Privacy policy Recipients Record audio Recipient successfully removed. Recipient list successfully removed. Recipient successfully added. Recipient list successfully added. You are about to delete recipient %1$s. Do you want to proceed? You are about to delete recipients list %1$s. Deletion of list will not delete assotiated recipients. Do you want to proceed? Email Audio was not recorded, please try again. If you want to record audio, please press the RECORD button in the bottom of the screen. You can now use this audio recording as your evidence or your can hear it by pressing the PLAY button in the bottom of the screen. RECORDING AUDIO.... PLAYING AUDIO.... Report preview Recipient successfully updated. Recipient list successfully updated. Remove Report Required Recommended You can change who will receive your reports by entering edit report mode. Settings Panic mode Edit the panic message, Circle of Trust and data to be erased Send Save Accepted. Application will not be visible on your home screen in a moment. Accepted. Application will be shown on your home screen in a moment. 00 : 00 Save to drafts Report is saved to drafts. Setting data… Sensitive data Select what data from Whistler you want erased when you activate panic mode Sending Report. Error sending Report. Please try again, or save Report in drafts for later attempt. Report data successfully sent. Evidence multimedia will be sent in background. Skip Rename list and manage recipients Source code Only send attachments over WiFi Multimedia attachments can be very large. Select if you want multimedia attachments to be sent separately from your form, over wiFi only (once uploaded attachments will be linked to the form). If you delete this server, all draft and submitted forms will be deleted from your device. Delete anyway? Server removed. Server created successfully. Server updated successfully. Server settings Server name Server URL Submitted To save cellular data, multimedia evidence can be sent separately over WiFi (see settings). Sent Sent reports View and resend reports you\'ve already sent Tap anywhere to cancel Title of report Training room Are you sure that you want to remove %1$s from the Circle of Trust? Contact is successfully removed. Panic mode Whistler Security Record Audio Today Title is not included Lock screen About & Help Edit list Collect Collect Settings Train Unzipping files… Unzipping finished. Use as evidence Unknown Update recipient Username Updated: %1$s Version Yesterday Your Panic Message Attachments Draft saved successfully Submitting form… Error submitting form Error submitting form: %s Form received. Server replied: Form received. Form accepted, do not try to resubmit. Server replied: Form accepted, do not try to resubmit. Received response is not from OpenRosa compliant server (%d). Check your server URL settings and make sure proxy servers are not involved. There were validation errors in answers In order to include your location in media metadata, you need to allow access to location permissions. Select time Select date No date selected Getting blank forms from server… Error on getting forms from There was an error parsing this form Save form Draw pattern to unlock Wrong pattern, please retry Cancel Confirm Draw the pattern again to confirm Continue Draw an unlock pattern Your new unlock pattern Pattern recorded Connect at least %d dots, please redraw Release finger when done Redraw tap Submit Form below to send If you are not connected to the Internet, your form will be sent as soon as you get online. Once submitted, you will still be able to edit the form and re-submit it. To save cellular data, multimedia attachments will be sent over WiFi if you have enabled it in your settings. Submit Form Previous Section Next Section Stop Play Record Play Audio This will only delete the form from your device. As it was already submitted, the data will remain accessible on the server. Draft form will be deleted. Form deleted Language Select the language for the app menu Keep Whistler in the same language as my device Default Language selection Share Unauthorized Import photo from device There was an error while importing media Import video from device Go back\nand edit You\'ve reached\nthe end of the form Form not sent as you are not connected. Your form will ne sent as soon as you get online. Pending form submission will be discarded. Discard Submit Form will be deleted. Form saved successfully Media added to gallery Export Media exported There was an error while exporting media In order to export media, application needs permission to write external storage %1$d media deleted. Error deleting files. Some media is not deleted. %1$d media exported Delete media? Selected media will be permanently deleted from your gallery. Save to device storage? Saving this media to your device storage will make it accessible from outside of the Whistler app, by other apps and in your device\'s gallery. Encrypting media… Decrypting media… Import from device Error opening phone gallery for import In order to acquire media application needs access to your camera and audio. There was an error while capturing media. There was an error on attaching media. Capture with camera Error getting form definition Error getting form definition: %s Not found Whistler Gallery In order to show camera preview application needs access to your camera. Enable camera preview Capture verifiable photo and video Insufficient disk space Zip file corrupted Error downloading train module. The module downloading is in progress Module download size is %s. Selected train module will be deleted. Getting training modules from server… Train module removed Removing train module failed Module download in background started Error starting module download Search by name or ID number Module download paused Waiting for network connection to resume. General Manage language and method of sending multimedia attachments Security Manage Secret Mode and the Panic Button Contact Decide how recipients can reach you Manage contact information, recipients and lists Bypass blocking Only enable if you know about attempts to block Whistler in your region or country Report Recipients Media attached to report Required fields are missing %1$s recipient %1$s recipients %1$s photo %1$s photos %1$s video %1$s videos %1$s audio %1$s audios Archive Recipients of your reports may want to ask you additional questions before using or publishing your evidence. Enter here your preferred method to be contacted. \n\nBefore sending a report, you will be able to choose whether to include this contact information. \n\nTo better protect yourself, consider entering a secure mode of communication (Signal, Wickr, ProtonMail, etc) or a dedicated email account. Preferred method Recommended Other Select your preferred method to be contacted Signal Wickr Wire Email Whatsapp Telegram Facebook Twitter Other Your Signal number Your Wickr username Your Wire username Your email address Your Whatsapp number Your Telegram username or phone number Your Facebook URL Your Twitter handle Your contact information Training module downloaded If you are not connected to the Internet, your Report will be sent as soon as you get online. Tell us what you think Feedback Use this space to tell us what you think about Whistler and share:\n- bugs and glitches that you may experience\n- ideas on how to improve existing features\n- suggestions for new features\n- any other comment you may have to make Whistler better! Send feedback Name (optional) Email (optional) Type your feedback here Your feedback has been successfully submitted An error has occurred during submission of your feedback Please wait while Whistler submits your feedback. Your draft will be lost. SAVE AND EXIT EXIT ANYWAY Date not included Share in a Report Media deleted No connection available Field is not valid web URL Panic Sort by Show Newest to oldest Oldest to newest All Photo Video Audio With metadata Without metadata Attached files To apply those changes, the app needs to be exited. Exit Delete Whistler from device After the Panic countdown expires, your device will ask you \"Do you want to uninstall this app?\". Unless you confirm, Whistler will not be deleted from your device. Camouflage Advanced Hide Whistler on your device Save anyway Wrong credentials, please check username and password No address associated with hostname There was an error trying to connect to the server Whistler was unable to connect to the internet and to the server Try again Skip intro Start Documentation and protection Whistler enables anyone to document human right abuses, violence and corruption without putting themselves in danger. Learn more about Whistler Protection against device searches Whistler can be hidden on your device and all photo, video and audio files captured in Whistler or imported are automatically encrypted and stored in hidden gallery. Hide Whistler on your device Verifiable evidence Geolocation information is automatically attached to multimedia so that recipients can use them more reliably in the media, for advocacy or in court cases. Reports can be shared anonymously or not. Set up Report Easy data collection Online or offline, fill forms and surveys directly from your device. You must be linked to a sponsor organization who created the forms and manages the data collection process. Set up Collect to fill forms Emergency alert In emergency situations, alert a network of trusted contacts and delete sensitive information from Whistler in just a few seconds. Set up your Panic Button Grant permissions Tutorial & Set up In order to function properly, you need to grant Whistler the required permissions. One last thing… In order to function properly, you need to authorize Whistler to: • send SMS (to alert your trusted contacts when you trigger the Panic Button)\n• make phone calls and access your call history (to open Whistler in Secret Mode)\n• access your device storage (to export multimedia files from Whistler to your device)\n• access your camera (to capture photos and videos)\n• access your microphone (to record audio)\n• access your GPS (to determine your geolocation when you capture data or multimedia, to make them verifiable) Everything Selected files Change icon Select app icon Select a custom icon and name to better hide Whistler on the device. Note that the Whistler icon will remain visible from the Android settings menu. Camera CameraPro SuperCam EasyCam Save to device Enable metadata Whistler does not store metadata that might identify you, but embeds anonymized metadata to help authenticate your evidence (geolocation, altitude, etc). If this puts you in danger, disable to strip all metadata. Draft and sent Reports Draft and submitted Collect forms Easy data collection To receive forms and submit data, you must first connect to a compatible server. Ask your sponsor organization for the server information and set up the server here. If you are not working with an organization, you can still send a Report here. There are no sent Reports to show There are no draft Reports to show There are no draft forms to show There are no submitted forms to show There are no servers to show. Tap the + button to add a server There are no lists to show. Tap the + button to create lists There are no recipients to show. Tap the + button to add recipients There are no contacts in your Circle of Trust. Tap the + button to add contacts There are no training modules to show. Tap the refresh button while connected to the internet to see available modules There are no blank forms to show. Tap the refresh button to check if there are blank forms available from the servers you\'re connected to. Report Help A Report is a quick, easy and secure way to share events you witness Decide who receives your report by adding recipients and creating lists Include your contact information or keep the Reports anonymous Automatically include geolocation metadata to make your Report verifiable Metadata is disabled. This means that in the Report, your multimedia files, even those that were captured with metadata, will not be verifiable. Turn off here to enable metadata and make the Report verifiable. Camouflage enables you to hide Whistler on your device, so that anyone searching it will not be able to see that you have Whistler. Remember that the name "Whistler" and the original logo will remain visible in your device\'s settings, so an in-depth search may expose you. None Keep Whistler\'s regular appearance Change appearance Select a different name and logo Make invisible Whistler will disappear from your list of apps. To open it, dial and call your secret code from your regular calling app. Tap here to create or edit your secret code There are no files to show. Tap the + button to capture or import multimedia EXIT NOW Whistler will now close to apply changes Create passcode Old passcode New passcode Change secret mode passcode Confirm passcode Passcode Contact is successfully added. Contact is successfully updated. Collect Help Collect is a tool to collect data by filling forms and surveys directly on your device To receive forms and submit data, you must first connect to a server. Ask you sponsor organization for the server information and set up the server here. If you would like to create your own forms, contact us or use any service based on the Open Data Kit (ODK) If you are not connected to the Internet, you can still fill forms. The data will be submitted as soon as you get online. Help me I\'m in trouble Recipients Help Decide who will receive your report.

Your recipients will receive an email with a link leading to your report. The email will be sent from
report@whistlerapp.org

To save time when sending your report to many recipients, you can create lists of recipients. Just select the list, and all recipients included will receive the report You’re not connected to the internet. Try again when connected. Opt-out from crash reports In order to improve the app, reports about crashes are automatically sent to the Whistler team. The reports include data such as device model, android version, etc. Enable camera preview on homescreen In some contexts, the camera preview may attract the attention of people around you. Disable if this presents a risk. Add group Add One More Group? Add New Group? Add another \"%s\" group? Add a new \"%s\" group? Do not add
